PS2CC
-----

1.2.0.404 - (15/06/2001)
	. ps2ld Syntax for filenames with spaces in is incompatible with GNU collect2/ld.  ps2cc patched to detect ps2ld and correct.

1.2.0.389 - (11/06/2001)
	. Licence info correctly in place.

1.2.0.383 - (07/06/2001)
	. Displays coherent version information
